  1. org.springframework.boot.tomcat

Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.tomcat

Packages that use org.springframework.boot.tomcat
Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.tomcat
Reactive and servlet web server implementations backed by Tomcat.
org.springframework.boot.tomcat.autoconfigure
Classes related to the auto-configuration of a servlet or reactive web server using Tomcat.
org.springframework.boot.tomcat.reactive
Reactive web server implementation backed by Tomcat.
org.springframework.boot.tomcat.servlet
Servlet web server implementation backed by Tomcat.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.tomcat used by org.springframework.boot.tomcat
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurableTomcatWebServerFactory
    ConfigurableWebServerFactory for Tomcat-specific features.
    TomcatConnectorCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize a Tomcat Connector.
    TomcatContextCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize a Tomcat Context.
    TomcatEmbeddedContext.DeferredStartupExceptions
    Strategy interface that can be used to rethrow deferred startup exceptions.
    TomcatProtocolHandlerCustomizer
    Callback interface that can be used to customize the ProtocolHandler on the Connector.
